rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with traditional Kerala motifs and functional storage, aligning with Vastu principles by ensuring the entrance is properly oriented. The area allows natural light to enter.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan space combining living and dining areas, featuring high ceilings and traditional wooden detailing. Natural ventilation ensured by strategically placed windows. The layout adheres to Vastu by maintaining balance and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with modern amenities integrated, designed for efficient workflow and natural lighting. Windows positioned for optimal airflow according to local architectural norms and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace that blends traditional design elements with contemporary functionality. Located in a quiet corner of the ground floor for concentration, adhering to Vastu by ensuring minimal distractions and proper energy flow.

openings.description: Large main entrance designed with traditional stone arches, ensuring a welcoming entry that aligns with both aesthetic and Vastu requirements.
Multiple strategically placed windows to ensure ample natural light and ventilation in line with local building norms.
Traditional wooden doors, ensuring privacy while maintaining a sense of openness within the home. Doors are aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with traditional Kerala-style decor. The room is designed to be south-facing for optimum comfort and Vastu alignment, featuring a window for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom in the first floor that follows similar design principles to ensure proper airflow and traditional aesthetic appeal. Oriented according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: High windows for natural light with minimal interference in privacy, following local architectural norms.
Small traditional balconies attached to each bedroom providing outdoor access and fresh air while respecting Vastu guidelines for proper energy distribution.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A relaxing living space on the second floor with expansive windows, designed to let in natural light and maintain a connection with the outdoors. Traditional design elements are visible throughout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a quiet ambience that adheres to Vastu by ensuring proper orientation and energy flow, complete with traditional Kerala motifs.

openings.description: Large windows for ample natural lighting while maintaining privacy. The layout respects local building norms and Vastu principles.
Traditional wooden doors for aesthetic consistency with the Kerala design, ensuring smooth transitions between spaces.
